text:
Aimee Lou Wood (born 3 February 1995) is a British actress. She is best known for her role as Aimee Gibbs in the Netflix original comedy-drama series, "Sex Education", from 2019 onwards. She will also appear in the upcoming film "Louis Wain".
Wood was born and raised in Stockport, Greater Manchester. She graduated from the Royal Academy of Dramatic Art (RADA) in 2017. She is dating "Sex Education" co-star Connor Swindells.
